short_instructions.courseA_maze_seq2: Toe faasao le faailo ina ia oo le manu i le puaa
short_instructions.courseA_maze_seq3: Toe faasao le faailo ina ia oo le manu i le puaa
short_instructions.courseA_maze_seq4: AVEESE le poloka ina ia oo le manu i le puaa!
short_instructions.courseA_maze_seq9: Toe aveese manu faalafua i lenei laasaga i le faaopoopoina o poloka e oo ai le manu i le puaa!
short_instructions.courseA_playLab_events4: Faaopoopo ni poloka mo le alu i le taumatau pe a oomi le ki o le 'right'.
short_instructions.courseA_playLab_events7: Faaopoopo soo se mea e te manao ai i lenei taaloga. E mafai ona e faanimo le manu feai pea tamoe iai Jorge?
short_instructions.courseD_artist_ramp11: Fai nei loa se tafafa i le faaaogaina o le Tusiata
short_instructions.courseD_scrat_ramp3: O loo iai se poloka faaopoopo o le a faatupu ai se faalavelave mo Scrat. Tiai i le tosoina i tua o le pusa faigaluega
short_instructions.courseD_scrat_ramp4: Alo mamao ma le aisa ta'e ina ia saogalemu Scrat
short_instructions.courseD_scrat_ramp5: Alo mamao mai le aisa ta'e
short_instructions.courseD_scrat_ramp6: Fesoasoani ia Scrat e oo i le fatulaau i le faaaogaina o se lio
short_instructions.courseD_scrat_ramp8: Faaaoga aoaoga na e maua e faaoo ai Scrat i le fatulaau.
short_instructions.courseD_video_nestedLoopsArtist: Faaaoga lou malamalama mai aoaoga e tusi ai lenei tafatolu.
short_instructions.courseE_artist_ramp8: Fai nei loa se tafafa i le faaaogaina o le Tusiata
short_instructions.courseE_artist_ramp8_2: Fai nei loa se tafafa i le faaaogaina o le Tusiata
short_instructions.courseE_artist_ramp9: Faaaoga lou malamalama mai aoaoga e tusi ai lenei tafatolu.
short_instructions.courseF_playlab_variables7b: Fai ni fesili ma tuu i totonu foi ma ni tali faatasi ai ma sau lava tala.
short_instructions.courseF_playlab_variables7c: Faatonu le taaloga e fai se galuega i le fesili i le tagata e mate se lanu
short_instructions.courseF_playlab_variables8c: Faaaoga fuainumera ina ia faatatau atili le taaloga ia te oe
